about.title: About Pomodoro Timer
about.description: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method developed by Francesco Cirillo in the late 1980s. Our app brings this powerful technique to your mobile device, helping you break work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes in length, separated by short breaks.
about.mission: Our mission is to help people achieve more by working smarter, not harder.
